label.phrase: the free-agent signings of the blackhawks caught my attention but you also have to develop your own players

clusterList.phrase: the free-agent signings of the blackhawks caught my attention but you also have to develop your own players
i thought the whl would be a better route for me to getting to my goal of playing in the nhl because it's a little faster it is what is best for me
i guess i'm trying to look past the 2009 wjc because i really want to play in the nhl next year and if i don't do that i'm not going to be satisfied

obviously i had a dream of playing in the nhl when the opportunity to play for the rangers came along i felt it was the best place for me if we would not have won in chicago i would have left with the sense there was some unfinished work it's always easier to leave when you go out on a win
